explanation: [0-0] On a light yellow ground, there's a black and white swirl pattern, with a background of blue sky and pixelated white clouds.

[0-7] First, a pixelated Spiderman appears on the right side, rolling from the air and stopping in front of the black and white swirl, crouching with one leg and the other stretched to the side. A pixelated Hulk appears behind Spiderman. Spiderman stretches his left arm towards the left and shoots a white spider silk, using it to swing to the left and out of the frame. Hulk walks to the black and white swirl, looks down at it, raises his hands to hold his head, opens his mouth wide, and looks to the left. Then, Hulk bends down, picks up the black and white swirl from the ground with both hands, lifts it over his head, takes a few steps to the left, throws the black swirl from behind his head, and walks out of the frame from the left.
